pageProduct.name: U by Kotex Maxi Pad Overnight Long Wing 8 Pack
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

U by Kotex Extra Overnight Long Pads provide mega protection that hugs your body for ultimate comfort. Overnight Long Pads are even longer, and over 25% wider at the back for maximum protection, so you can enjoy that beauty snooze without a worry, because your dreams don't stop when your period starts.

  • Our longest and widest Extra Pad
  • Overnight Long Pads are even longer, and over 25% wider at the back for maximum protection
  • Secure Wings keep the pad firmly in place while sleeping
  • Anti-leak side guards at the side and the back

Size: 8 Pads
